entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:12 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 12:12 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near noon then changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:12 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
